description: This file defines a ViewModel class 'NotesViewModel' for an Android application, managing notes data with LiveData and interacting with a repository to fetch, search, and delete notes.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel for managing notes data, including fetching, searching, and deleting notes.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the repository and updates LiveData variables accordingly.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes based on a query string, updates LiveData with results.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID in the repository, then refreshes notes or updates error LiveData.
